revised_title: Approximate Elastic Critical Loads of Rigidly Jointed Plane Frameworks
tldr: The author presents a method to determine the approximate elastic critical loads of rigidly jointed plane frameworks with redundant members. The method involves expressing the load pattern as a function of the unknown forces in one non-redundant member and the redundant members. By maximizing the load pattern subject to the elliptical approximation, an estimate of the elastic critical load of the redundant framework is obtained.
